an9.65:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these five objects of sensual pleasure. What five? Forms cognizable by the eye that are wished for, desired, agreeable, pleasing, connected with sensual pleasure, tantalizing; sounds cognizable by the ear … odours cognizable by the nose … tastes cognizable by the tongue … tactile objects cognizable by the body that are wished for, desired, agreeable, pleasing, connected with sensual pleasure, tantalizing.
an9.65:2: These are the five objects of sensual pleasure …. These four establishments of mindfulness are to be developed for abandoning these five objects of sensual pleasure."
